hero.name: Hussein Ashraf
hero.jobTitle: Frontend Developer  with 1 year or more of experience.
hero.description: Building interactive digital solutions that drive business growth.

about.description1: Motivated and detail-oriented Frontend React Developer with a strong foundation in web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6), and React.js. Experienced in creating responsive and user-friendly web applications with a focus on high-quality code and seamless user experiences. Adept at collaborating in team environments, solving complex technical challenges, and committed to continuous learning to deliver innovative solutions that meet client needs.
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & AI
about.university: Beni Suef University, Faculty of Computer and Artificial Intelligence
